Articles.Content:
I have been having this problem for some time now and i cant seem to solve it. My grapple klaw will not release once it grabs on to anything. I have here the log, and also a copy of my mod list.

[http://www.filedropper.com/outputlog_1](http://www.filedropper.com/outputlog_1)

[http://i.imgur.com/ym4zM0U.png](http://i.imgur.com/ym4zM0U.png)

Any help is greatly appreciated!!

1. Final Frontier is throwing. Try without that?

2. Try without KJR, just in case.
KJR was my first thought, but it made no effect, after removing final frontier it worked perfectly. Ive gone about informing the mod maker and sending him here.
I have just tested this. Releasing the claw works for me, regardless if FF is installed or not.
